channel.title: Someone logs off and it goes offline?
channel.description: For some reason this just started happening. I have restarted my computer, router, and modem several times but it just keeps happening. Now when I turn my server on and someone logs off, the server turns off. How do I fix this from happening?

item.title: Someone logs off and it goes offline?
item.dc:creator: @SomeRandomNoob SomeRandomNoob
item.description:
@SomeRandomNoob wrote:

Probably something wrong with the Player Handler class. I would try to trace it from the player class to the server/socket handler class.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone logs off and it goes offline?
